title: In respect of those eligible beneficiaries of (3) (--) unauthorized / illegal buildings and slums en
clause_text: In respect of those eligible beneficiaries of (3) (--) unauthorized / illegal buildings and slums entitled for rehabilitation tenement in URC, who do not join the scheme willingly, the following steps shall be taken :- Provision for all of them shall be made in the rehabilitation component of the scheme.
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
